game.name: Dude Simulator 3
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dude Simulator 3 is an open world sandbox game. It is your friend’s birthday tomorrow. You have already bought him a present, now you only have to give it to him. But your friends lives in another city, quite far from you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dude Simulator 3 is an open world sandbox game. It is your friend’s birthday tomorrow. You have already bought him a present, now you only have to give it to him. But your friends lives in another city, quite far from you.

reviewHighlights.text: best game i ever played haters gonna hate
ts GOTTA be a cryptominer lol
